line.words: Manman m gen maltèt Pa Sophie Mills

subtitle.line: Mum Has a Headache By Sophie Mills
Mum Has a Headache By Sophie Mills

line.words: Tayo gen yon gita epi li pral chante. Li di §Mwen pito mizik pòp ak rege.”

subtitle.line: Tayo has a guitar and he is going to sing. “I prefer pop and reggae music,” he says.
Tayo has a guitar and he is going to sing. “I prefer pop and reggae music,” he says.

line.words: Lila gen flit. Li pral fredone. Li di “Mwen ta renmen jwe mizik djyaz. Li bèl”.

subtitle.line: Lila has a recorder. She is going to hum. “I would like to play jazz,” she says. “It’s super.”
Lila has a recorder. She is going to hum. “I would like to play jazz,” she says. “It’s super.”

line.words: Sol ak Riben gen yon vyolon ak yon saksofòn. Yo pral soufle. Sol di “Èske w renmen mizik sanmba ak wòk?” Riben reponn “Non, mwen pa renmen l”, “Li raz”.

subtitle.line: Sol and Reuben have a violin and a saxophone. They are going to whistle. “Do you like samba and rock music?” says Sol. “No, I don’t like it,” says Reuben, “it’s rubbish.”
Sol and Reuben have a violin and a saxophone. They are going to whistle. “Do you like samba and rock music?” says Sol. “No, I don’t like it,” says Reuben, “it’s rubbish.”

line.words: Roann ak Mala gen tanbou ak twonpèt. Yo pral bat tanbou e yo pral bat bravo. Roann mande “Kilès moun ki renmen mizik rap ak tekno?” Mala di “Mwen renmen l, li bèl anpil”.

subtitle.line: Rohan and Mala have drums and a trumpet. They are going to stamp and clap. “Who likes rap and techno music?” shouts Rohan. “I like it,” whispers Mala, “it’s great.”
Rohan and Mala have drums and a trumpet. They are going to stamp and clap. “Who likes rap and techno music?” shouts Rohan. “I like it,” whispers Mala, “it’s great.”

line.words: Lyrics go Manman m di “Bonjou tout moun?”, “Tèt mwen ap fè m mal”.

subtitle.line: “Hello everybody,” say mum. “I have a headache.”
“Hello everybody,” say mum. “I have a headache.”
